Text: Vielen Dank. By the way, there is a workbook(Essential German Grammar :http://www.amazon.com/Essential-German-Grammar-Hodder-Publication/dp/0340741899/ref=sr_1_3?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1308937763&sr=1-3) that goes with "18.Hammer's German Grammar and Usage"....Perhaps you dont have it. If it is not the case, would please upload it....thank you very much once again.....you can contact me at mahigitam@gmail.com

See also:
German Language Learning Pack (Vol. 2)

I'm living in German for what I presume will be the rest of my life, so may I just thank you for this opportunity to perfect my German. For complete beginner, I would recommend completing the Michel Thomas courses before moving onto this torrent. 

I'm actually surprised that there are so many seeders. I'm perfecting my German as I have a German missus and am working in a German environment. Are there any other reasons to learn it? Money and hot German girls, that's basically it. 

Anywho, thanks again.
